import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/authForm.css' export default function AuthForm(props) { const { authUser, signup, currentUser, errors, history } = props const [state, setState] = useState({ username: "", password: "" }) console.log(currentUser) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const authType = signup ? "signup" : "login" authUser(authType, state) .then(() => history.push("/")) .catch(err => { return }) } const handleChange = (e) => { setState({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return (
{signup &&
}
) }
